properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 8:17PM PST until February 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations of up to
one inch on the valley floor, with one to three inches in the
foothills. Northeast winds gusting 40 to 50 mph.

* WHERE...Antelope Valley. Strongest winds and heaviest snowfall
expected in the foothills.

* WHEN...Until noon PST Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty
winds could bring down tree branches. Travel on some roadways
may be affected including Highways 14 and 138...especially
near the foothills.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling
1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST MONDAY
